HomePage.description: The home page of the Demoblaze e-commerce website, displaying product categories, featured products, and navigation links. The screenshot also shows the 'Sign up' modal.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for username during sign-up.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for password during sign-up.

elements.name: Sign up Button
elements.description: Button to submit the sign-up form.

elements.name: Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the sign-up modal.

elements.name: Phones Category
elements.description: Link to navigate to the 'Phones' category.

elements.name: Laptops Category
elements.description: Link to navigate to the 'Laptops' category.

elements.name: Monitors Category
elements.description: Link to navigate to the 'Monitors' category.

elements.name: Sign up Link
elements.description: Link to open the sign-up modal.

assertions: Presence of featured products (e.g., Samsung galaxy s6, Nokia lumia 1520, Nexus 6)
